      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addBatch(Batch bch)
      Adds a batch to the database
      static Batch assignBatch(Project proj, User usr)
      This function returns the first available batch in the specified project and assigns it to the user in the database.
      static void deleteBatch(Batch bch)
      Deletes the specified batch from the database
      static Batch getBatch(int batchID)
      Gets the specified batch from the BatchDAO
      static Batch getSampleImage(int projectID)
      Gets a sample image from the BatchDAO based on the projectID
      static void submitBatch(int batchID, java.util.List<Record> records, java.util.List<IndexedData> indexedData)
      Does everything necessary to submit the batch using the DAOs (sets the batch's FullyIndexed value to true, updates the batch, inserts the records and the indexedData into the database etc)
      static void updateBatch(Batch bch)
      Updates the database to reflect the changes made to the batch object passed into the function

                            throws ModelException
        Gets a sample image from the BatchDAO based on the projectID

        Returns:

      • assignBatch

        public static Batch assignBatch(Project proj,
                User usr)
                         throws ModelException
        This function returns the first available batch in the specified project and assigns it to the user in the database.
        Parameters:
        proj - The project to assign the batch from
        usr - The user to assign the batch to
        Returns:
        The batch the user is assigned to
        Throws:
        ModelException

      • updateBatch

        public static void updateBatch(Batch bch)
                        throws ModelException
        Updates the database to reflect the changes made to the batch object passed into the function
        Parameters:
        bch - The batch to update, with the new data already in the batch object
        Throws:
        ModelException - if the batch specified does not exist, or if an error occurs

      • deleteBatch

        public static void deleteBatch(Batch bch)
                        throws ModelException
        Deletes the specified batch from the database
        Parameters:
        bch - The batch to delete from the database
        Throws:
        ModelException - if the batch specified does not exist, or if an error occurs
